trans-unit.source: Example Apache Storm topologies on HDInsight | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Example Apache Storm topologies on HDInsight | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: A list of example Storm topologies created and tested with Apache Storm on HDInsight including basic C# and Java topologies, and working with Event Hubs.
trans-unit.target: A list of example Storm topologies created and tested with Apache Storm on HDInsight including basic C# and Java topologies, and working with Event Hubs.

trans-unit.source: Example Storm toplogies and components for Apache Storm on HDInsight
trans-unit.target: Example Storm toplogies and components for Apache Storm on HDInsight

trans-unit.source: The following is a list of examples created and maintained by Microsoft for use with Apache Storm on HDInsight.
trans-unit.target: The following is a list of examples created and maintained by Microsoft for use with Apache Storm on HDInsight.

trans-unit.source: These examples cover a variety of topics, from creating basic C# and Java topologies to working with Azure services such as Event Hubs, DocumentDB, Power BI, SQL Database, HBase on HDInsight, and Azure Storage.
trans-unit.target: These examples cover a variety of topics, from creating basic C# and Java topologies to working with Azure services such as Event Hubs, DocumentDB, Power BI, SQL Database, HBase on HDInsight, and Azure Storage.

trans-unit.source: Some examples also demonstrate how to work with non-Azure, or even non-Microsoft technologies, such as SignalR and Socket.IO
trans-unit.target: Some examples also demonstrate how to work with non-Azure, or even non-Microsoft technologies, such as SignalR and Socket.IO
